search

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> search(int keyId,
                                                               java.lang.String value,
                                                               java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> _subSet,
                                                               java.lang.String objectType,
                                                               double relevance)
                                                        throws DataLinkException
Description copied from interface: DataLink
Search for objects that are associated to meta data with the given key and whose value contains the specified value among a specified sub set of objects and restricted to the given type of objects.

Specified by:
search in interface DataLink
Parameters:
keyId - The id of a meta data key.
value - A value to find within meta data string values.
_subSet - A sub set of object identifiers to search in. A null sub set means all objects.
objectType - An object type to restrict to (either 'book', 'page', 'region', 'metadata' or null for all types).
relevance - Minimum relevance of matches.
Returns:
A list of results. Each result contains the identifier of an object and the value of its meta data that matched the query.
Throws:
DataLinkException - If an error occurs.
